name: Steward Pope
description: Would love to be the white knight who rescues you from the north tower of loneliness. Currently, I am trapped in a maze of metro-mess road reconstruction looking for the path to the tower that imprisons your heart. My armor’s shine has dulled from previous battles of the sexes; however, the inflicted wounds have healed with no attached baggage. My motives are good, my heartbeat is sometimes steady, and I have an even chance of continued breathing. Can enjoy almost anything (except line dancing and opera) during the few downtime from my quest of trying to rescue you.
